1.0.name: wordpress/flickr-zoom-badge
1.0.description: This plugin gives you a widget, that will display a random collection of photo thumbnails from a flickr account and/or flickr tag set. A JavaScript routine will cycle randomly through the thumbnails, zooming a thumbnail similar to what the Flickr Flash Badge does.

1.1.name: wordpress/flickr-zoom-badge
